title: Aurelion Sol... Something's familiar
body:
Okay, this is just a hunch, but I want to point out a similarity I found with the Aurelion Sol teaser.
Could be just me though...
https://gifs.com/gif/v2mwwg
https://gifs.com/gif/L9AGGp
Is Aurelion Sol the real Rito Games?
Feel free to leave your thoughts on this!

replies.body: Best theory ever.

Aurelion Sol=Rito 
Confirmed?
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GuCvNjovTKs/hqdefault.jpg

BUT WHAT ABOUT [THIS?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gG1U5yrRQeQ)

OR [tHIS?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RnqrYBPUmUk)
It was {{champion:27}} the whole time you dimbis
when is the relase date
Better Call Aurelion Sol memes plz.

http://imgur.com/ZB1kFCF
Happy now?

> [{quoted}](name=Fishtaco,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P2e35mH2,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-03-04T04:22:32.630+0000)
>
> http://imgur.com/ZB1kFCF
> Happy now?

So happy!
This is my new phone background.
Aurelion Sol- "I don't play the game, I am the game."

http://imgur.com/2nM66b3
He just broke the internet.
Honestly that should've been a quote for Final Boss {{champion:45}}

Should we make Aurelion our new god to replace Rito?

"sol pls"

Aurelion sol
rito
aurito sol
rito sol
solito
illuminati
That took me on a journey. A bewildering, scary journey.
Don't you mean a *magical* journey {{champion:432}}?

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P2e35mH2,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-03-06T07:10:28.575+0000)
>
> That took me on a journey. A bewildering, scary journey.

A bewildering, scary, magical journey?? {{champion:432}}  Magical journeys are scary journeys indeed. Remember kids, don't ~~talk to~~ go through ~~strangers~~ strange magical journeys.
Not even a champ. Just patch notes that completely screw up the game.
Dragon god is Rito god.
He reminds me of Fin Fang Foom.
You, I like you

All I know is, this damn dragon is going to be hungry and like eating people and planets alike.  

Time to start building our dragon survival bunkers!
What do you guys think the abilities of Aurelion Sol. Aurelion=Aurelius it means Gold. Sol it means Sun. Will have he an ability like Kayle Q or Kassadin Q with that ball????

http://goo.gl/1rDjen

Now let the true conspiracies commence.
No that hand from the old trailers was the Summoner's hand

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P2e35mH2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-04T02:13:28.856+0000)
>
> Aurelion Sol- "I don't play the game, I am the game."

If he said that in champion select with that sick voice ill get him in a heart beat, with no background knowledge.
Aurelion Sol is Rito Games. Confirmed
THAT IS EXACTLY WHAT I THOUGHT
Just like the glass my mind has been blown

I mean, when I first heard his voice my first thought was "Mufasa?!"

Dunno why, the way he talks just reminds me of giant ghost dad-lion.
